_header: Pope John the XII at Avignon was
Title(s): ‘De passione domini nostri ihesu Cristi de horis canonicis’
Subjects: Christ, Passion of; Passion, meditations on
_description: John Audelay, ‘De passione domini nostri ihesu Cristi de horis canonicis’ — fifteen 8-line stanzas and a concluding quatrain

BodDou302.First Lines:
Pope ion þe xij at auyon wasþer in þe worchip of
                    cristis passion…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…þat mad in englische þis passionffore synful men to
                    haue mynd þer on
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
De passione domini nostri ihesu christi et de horis canonicis
                        (15ra)
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 97-101.
